parameters.query:
SELECT o.*, c.whatsapp_number, c.name as customer_name
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id
WHERE o.order_number = '{{ $json.orderNumber }}'
  AND o.customer_id = {{ $json.customerId }};

UPDATE orders
SET status = 'payment_submitted',
    payment_reference = '{{ $('Parse Payment Data').item.json.paymentReference }}',
    updated_at = NOW()
WHERE order_number = '{{ $json.order_number }}'
RETURNING *;
